department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
description: The Department of Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada’s (AAFC) Swift Current Research and Development Centre (SCRDC) has a requirement for the supply and delivery of one (1) new Cultivator/Chisel Plow unit.
full_summary:
## Government Tender Announcement

### Title: 01581-240099B Field Cultivator
### Modified Solicitation Number: WS4068767397 (Rev 2)

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is issuing a request for proposal (RFP) for the supply and delivery of a new Cultivator/Chisel Plow unit. This solicitation cancels and supersedes previous solicitation number 01581-240099, with a closing date of October 18, 2023 at 2:00pm Eastern Daylight Time (EDT).

### Solicitation Details

* Solicitation Number: WS4068767397 (Rev 2)
* Publication Date: September 27, 2023
* Closing Date and Time: October 18, 2023 2:00pm EDT
* Expected Contract Start Date: October 18, 2023
* Expected Contract End Date: August 18, 2024
* The RFP is issued on the behalf of Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada (AAFC) Swift Current Research and Development Centre (SCRDC)

### Goods and Services

The Solicitor intends to purchase one (1) new Cultivator/Chisel Plow unit, for the purpose of soil preparation.

### Proposal Evaluation Criteria

The evaluation of proposals will be based on the lowest price.

### Trade Agreements

The procurement is subject to the following trade agreements:

* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

### Contact Information

For further information, please contact Jordan, Amanda (SPAC/PSPC) at amanda.jordan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
